name: Lightbringer
entries: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a {@item torch|phb} when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@damage 1d6} radiant damage to undead creatures.
